title: VERA FILES FACT CHECK: Roque flip-flops on ‘culture of impunity’
subtitle: Presidential Spokesperson Harry Roque contradicted himself when he said the Aquino administration shares the blame for the “culture of impunity” in the country.
author: verafiles.org
vclaim:
Presidential Spokesperson Harry Roque contradicted himself when he said the Aquino administration shares the blame for the “culture of impunity” in the country.

A month ago, he insisted such culture did not exist after two town mayors were killed consecutively.
